title: Higurashi Daybreak Portable: Mega Edition
original_name: ひぐらしデイブレイク Portable MEGA EDITION
sinopse:
One day, Rena found a magic mirror that can grant any wish. To choose who will get that mirror, the club members begin the club activities, it's the battle in pairs. Mion teams with Keiichi. While they are in preparation, Satoshi returns. Shion and Satoko team is very glad, but Mion and Rika have an uncomfortable feeling about that...

(Source: MU)
